name: @moxie-protocol/plugin-moxie-autonomous-trading
author: Senpi
description: Have Senpi automatically buy and sell tokens for you when specific conditions are met!
capabilities: Copy Trade specific user(s)
Copy Trade a group
Buy when they buy + Sell when they sell
Buy when they buy + Sell when price achieved
Sophisticated combinations
You can view all your open Auto-Trade rules in the Autonomous Trades section of the dashboard
The Orders page now also includes a tab for executed Auto-Trades
â€œSell when they sellâ€ will currently sell 100% of your tokens purchased in the auto-trade when they sell 50% of theirs. Youâ€™ll be able to adjust these settings in a future release.
